Jollibee Palabok Menu

Traditional Filipino noodle dish with a rich, flavorful sauce, topped with shrimp, eggs, and chicharron. A true local favorite that brings authentic Filipino taste.

Palabok Prices - June 2025 Updated

Experience the authentic taste of Filipino cuisine with our traditional Palabok. Rice noodles in a rich, savory sauce topped with fresh ingredients for a truly satisfying meal.

View Complete Palabok Menu

Regular Palabok

Classic Palabok serving with rice noodles, rich sauce, shrimp, hard-boiled eggs, and chicharron. Perfect individual portion of this Filipino favorite.

Order Now

Large Palabok

Bigger serving of our delicious Palabok for those with heartier appetites or for sharing with someone special.

Order Now

Family Palabok

Large family-size serving perfect for sharing with 2-3 people. Great for family meals or when you want to share this Filipino delicacy.

Order Now

Palabok with Extra Shrimp

Regular Palabok with additional shrimp for seafood lovers who want more protein and flavor in their noodle dish.

Order Now

Palabok with Extra Toppings

Enhanced Palabok with extra eggs, chicharron, and other traditional toppings for a more indulgent experience.

Order Now

Palabok Combo

Complete meal with Palabok and your choice of beverage. Great value for a satisfying Filipino noodle meal experience.

Order Now

Palabok with Chickenjoy

Perfect combination of Filipino noodles and crispy fried chicken. The best of both worlds in one satisfying meal.

Order Now

Party Tray Palabok

Large party tray perfect for celebrations, gatherings, or office events. Serves multiple people with authentic Filipino flavor.

Order Now
